title: Social Constructivist-Based Language Learning Design in the Digital Transformation Era

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and Beginner-Level Language Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Learners experience design uncertainties in digital transformation processes, requiring learning environments that emphasize collaborative and iterative improvement

learning_goals: Using digital tools, learners can design language learning scenarios through collaboration with peer learners.
Applying an agile mindset, learners can iteratively improve and execute learning activities at least three times.
According to social constructivist principles, learners can lead knowledge sharing within learning communities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
